info.name: Game of Thrones
info.description:
For Game of Thrones fans.
For original documentation, go to https://www.anapioficeandfire.com/Documentation

exec: // Pass the response body parsed as JSON as `data`

query.description: Characters with the given name are included in the response. Exact values only.
Characters with the given gender are included in the response.
Characters with the given culture are included in the response.
Characters that were born this given year are included in the response.
Characters that died this given year are included in the response.
Characters that are alive or dead (depending on the value) are included in the response.

request.description:
Returns a list of Game of Thrones characters.

Website - https://anapioficeandfire.com/Documentation

response.name: Daenerys

query.description: Characters with the given name are included in the response.
Characters with the given gender are included in the response.
Characters with the given culture are included in the response.
Characters that were born this given year are included in the response.
Characters that died this given year are included in the response.
Characters that are alive or dead (depending on the value) are included in the response.

query.description: Books with the given name are included in the response
Books that were released after, or on, the given date are included in the response.
Books that were released before, or on, the given date are included in the response.

request.description:
Returns a list of Game of Thrones books.

Website - https://anapioficeandfire.com/Documentation

response.name: The World of Ice and Fire

query.value: The World of Ice and Fire
query.description: Books with the given name are included in the response
Books that were released after, or on, the given date are included in the response.
Books that were released before, or on, the given date are included in the response.

query.description: Houses with the given name are included in the response
Houses that belong in the given region are included in the response.
Houses that has the given words are included in the response.
Houses that have words (or not) are included in the response.
Houses that have titles (or not) are included in the response.
Houses that have seats (or not) are included in the response.
Houses that are extinct are included in the response.

Returns a list of Game of Thrones houses.
